remarks: The positive part of a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.)
statement:
mbfpos.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
mbfpos.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfpos $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> if ( 0 <_ B , B , 0 ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
